doc.field: Old standards like sauerbraten and Wiener schnitzel sparkle with clear and distinct flavor at this German restaurant...
I confess to suffering a bit from those misgivings myself, but had my perspective readjusted on a recent Saturday...
Generous portions of traditional German cuisine and brews draw the crowds to this popular Hayes Valley restaurant.
Cozy and friendly neighborhood restaurant that serves hearty and well-executed German cuisine.
